Description: Ostracon, section (three fragments joined) of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the interior is slightly grooved and partially covered with an off-white deposit, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of three lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393963) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393963)
